item.description:
Every Friday in the summer the museum sponsors music in the courtyard.

Friday the 30th is a free MFA admissions day so why don't we take advantage?

Leave your work week behind and relax with friends both old and new. Enjoy live music outside in the Calderwood Courtyard, and get to see the museum as well.

Will meet in the courtyard at 6:00, listen to the music for a while, then those who are interested can take a tour of the museum.

Since this is a public venue will open up the limit on number of people who can attend. Will ask that if you can not attend to please update your profile to no.

Am changing the time to 6:15 as when I spoke to the museum today they told me there might be a line to get it. This should give everyone time to get in.

* Note: Rain will cancel this event
item.how_to_find_us: will meet in the courtyard near the bookstore. Will send an email with my cell on the day of the event.
item.name: Museum of Fine Arts Summer Friday
